Description:
Perform bookkeeping and prepare balance sheets, profit and loss statements and other financial reports. Require a bachelor's degree in area of specialty (B. Com/M. Com). Familiar with standard concepts, practices and procedures within accounting practice. Coordinate with experience team member to plan and accomplish goals. Perform a variety of tasks. Work under minimum supervision. A certain degree of creativity and latitude is required to optimize given tasks.Responsibilities:Prepare asset, liability and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information
Document financial transactions by entering account information
Summarize current financial status by collecting information; preparing balance sheet, profit and loss statement and other reports Substantiate financial transactions by reviewing documents
Reconcile financial discrepancies by collecting and analyzing account information
Post and reconcile transactions (Bank, control accounts, etc.)
Meet tight deadlines of clients to prepare financial statements and relevant reports
Communicate effectively and confidently with peers
Contribute to a strong client relationship through positive interactions with client personnelRequirements:Thorough knowledge of basic accounting procedures and principles
Knowledge of preparation and key elements of financial statements
Knowledge of accounting software
Understanding and knowledge of UAE VAT 
Accuracy and attention to detail
Aptitude for numbers and quantitative skills
Bachelor’s Degree (B. Com) or master’s degree (M. Com). work experience will be preferred.
Must hold dependent visa - sponsored by parent/spouse Job Details
